verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Hallelujah for the blood, for the sin-cleansing fountain, For the Lamb has been slain, and the ransom price paid; Fully cancelled was the debt, when on Calvaryâ€™s mountain All the sins of this world upon Jesus were laid.

verse.name: c
v2
verse.lines: Hallelujah for the blood; sing for joy, all ye nations, And rejoice that the work of redemption is done; Here is pardon free for all, and a perfect salvation Through the sin-cleansing blood of the Crucified One.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Hallelujah for the blood, hallelujah forever! We shall sing it anew in the kingdom of God, Where the anthems of delight shall be silent, no, never; Evermore hallelujah for Christ and the blood.
